name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DUANG AI copilot-writing/summarize/chat for PDF/WORD/TXT Anywhere

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Duang AI Tab,Use 1-Click AI Anywhere,all AI in one page,all prompt in one page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Enhance your workflow with Duang AI, an AI extension designed to streamline your tasks seamlessly. Experience the power of generative AI and enjoy a seven-day free trial upon download.

Say goodbye to tab-switching hassles while accessing AI tools like ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Copilot, and Kimi.

What tasks can AI automate for you? Duang AI is an All-in-One AI Assistant powered by GPT-4, offering features such as:

1️⃣ Reinvent your Chrome Startpage with AI capabilities, empowering your new tab with intelligent suggestions.
2️⃣ Summarize videos, scrape websites, respond to emails, automate searches, summarizations, translations, and writing tasks on websites with AI.
3️⃣ AI Writer: Create content for social media, emails, art, code, and more.
4️⃣ Plugins: Access the best AI plugins directly on your browser, including AI Chat and compatibility with PDF/WORD/TXT files.

Experience 1-Click AI Prompts Anywhere! Unlock the magic of AI with just one click on any webpage to enhance your productivity.

🧑‍🏫 How it works:
🎯 Press 'Alt + Q' on any webpage to open the AI chat sidebar on the right.
🎯 Press 'Ctrl + D' on any webpage to add the page to your Favorites.
🎯 Select text on any webpage and 1-click to rewrite, proofread, explain, translate, or run your own prompts.
🎯 Manage custom prompts in the 'one-click-prompt' section in the extension Settings.
🎯 Upload PDF/WORD/TXT files into the browser for instant summaries and answers.
🎯 Switch to the 'Search' tab in the sidebar, ask any question, and receive quick answers with cited search results.
🎯 Discover and run professional 1-click AI prompts on wboke.com for free.
🎯 Manage your list of favorite websites, pin them to the start screen or sidebar for quick access.

Duang AI offers real-time suggestions based on context extraction to enhance your online experience—available on all your favorite websites and web apps.

❓ Frequently Asked Questions:

📌 Do I need a ChatGPT/OpenAI account to use this extension?
✅ No, you can log in using Google, Microsoft, Twitter, or WeChat accounts.

📌 Is it free to use?
✅ Yes, enjoy a 7-day free trial. Choose our Pro Plans for unlimited access and share your invitation code for additional benefits!

📌 How can I get a coupon code?
✅ After logging in, open a new homepage in your browser, click 'More,' select 'Coupon,' and enter the "invite code" shared by your friend to activate it.

➤ Who are we?
We're a dedicated team focused on enhancing AI usability and improving work productivity.

➤ Get Started:

Click "Add to Chrome" at the upper right corner.
Refresh all tabs for Alt+Q shortcut activation.
Increase productivity with Duang AI!
➤ Important notes:
• Refresh webpages after installation for proper functionality.
• The extension won't work on Chrome/Edge Web Store pages for security reasons.

Need help or have feedback? Drop us a line at https://ai.wboke.com/.

Privacy Policy: https://www.wboke.com/site/Privacy.html
